style.label: function(f) {var name = f.get('public_name'); var other_name = f.get('other_name'); if (typeof other_name === 'undefined') {return name;} return name+'-'+other_name; }

metadata.citation: This track shows alleles that generate a putative change-of-function. In this track, the type of mutation is indicated by its glyph: Boxes are deletions. Triangles are insertions. Point mutations and substitutions are diamonds. Color shows the potential effect on coding regions. Green indicates a possible missense; red a possible nonsense; blue a frameshift; yellow a disruption of a coding exon(s); and white for everything else. Mouse over the feature for details.
